prompt:
What is one important aspect of an essay that you believe students should focus on?
Essays are essential for expressing thoughts clearly and effectively, making it vital to ensure they contain well-structured arguments supported by relevant evidence. Students must pay close attention to grammar and syntax; craft strong introductions and conclusions; incorporate persuasive language; use appropriate transition words between paragraphs; adhere to formatting guidelines such as margin size or line spacing requirements; and proofread their work thoroughly before submitting it.
